vote.title: To honor, recognize, and celebrate Stuart W. Stull for his 46 years of public service and dedication to the City of Columbus.
vote.description:
Title
 
To honor, recognize, and celebrate Stuart W. Stull for his 46 years of public service and dedication to the City of Columbus.
 
Body
 
WHEREAS, this Council honors and recognizes Stuart W. Stull for his outstanding service to the City of Columbus by giving his skills, energy, time, and commitment toward the betterment of our community through his dedicated service to the City of Columbus; and
WHEREAS, Stu has managed the City’s graphics section and has been a key contributor to various communication and policy initiatives throughout his tenure with the City; and
WHEREAS, Stu has served as a valued partner to City departments and has assisted with creating graphics and communication strategies that help provide valuable information and outreach to the greater Columbus community; and
WHEREAS, Stu is the consummate team player and his skills, work ethic, good nature, and collaborative spirit have made him an invaluable resource to the City; and
WHEREAS, Stu’s genuine compassion and concern for his co-workers and his willingness to always step up to get the job done has served as a model for public service; now, therefore   
BE IT RESOLVED BY THE COUNCIL OF THE CITY OF COLUMBUS: that we honor and recognize Stuart W. Stull for his lasting contributions to the City of Columbus and the residents of our community.
